item.description:
Join us for a trip to the famous Haunted Hammond Castle in Glouster Mass on

Saturday, July 23rd to tour the castle and attend the Renn Faire that will be there

on that day....We will be meeting at the Castle at 11:30.

 

The producers of Winslowshire Festival for the Animals are proud to announce they are bringing a fresh new Renaissance Festival to the amazingly beautiful Hammond Castle on July 23rd and 24th of 2011.

Come take a step back in time and enjoy live music, magic, live armored combat and more while perusing lovely hand crafted goods of all kinds and wonderful food all while seeing the amazing view of Hammond Castle.

Tickets are $12 for adults and $7 for kids (kids under 4 are free).  Time will be from 11 am to 5 pm.

 

 Check out the website for the haunted Hammond Castle at:

 

http://www.hammondcastle.org/common/index.php?com=HAMM&div=AA&nav=AA&page=A91
item.why: The place is awesome to see, and they are also having a Renn Faire there to boot! :)
item.name: Hammond Castle Renn Faire
